TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 09-06-1826
TEI.2.document_title: Littleberry Hawkins to Stephen F. Austin, 09-06-1826

barker_notes.barker_summary: Littleberry Hawkins to Austin, September 6, 1826. Asking for best mail route to Texas.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 09-06-1826

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Littleberry Hawkins to Austin, September 6, 1826. Asking for best mail route to Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Lexington */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-06-1826">Sept. 6. 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*DSir*/p*
*p*If You will inform me What is the mode or rout By Post if any established I can get Papers and letters to You I can at all times furnish You with something interesting I regret that the Notice of the *person_mentioned*Col*/person_mentioned*. starting was so short and would have written You more fully*/p*
*p*Your friend *person_mentioned*L Hawkins*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
